name: Amidst The Clouds
description:
Amidst the Clouds involves a city lost above the clouds with the only possible method of transportation is to travel from platform to platform. The inhabitants of the city have altered some of the platforms making it more difficult to reach the city. You must find a way to reach the destination and have the ability to parkour around the clouds that surround the hidden city.

Controls 

Movement: W, A, S, D | Jump: Spacebar 

Game Design Document
